animeDescription: A freak accident unleashes a demonic spirit within researcher John Stalker - transforming him into Saldo, a mythical cyber-beast fueled by hate and evil.  (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Einstein, Adler', 'Rozetta, Leyla', 'Stalker, John', 'Detective Gordon', 'Captain Jack', 'Priest', 'Dr. Volkes', 'Randol']
